review: This is one of my most enjoyable entertainment devices.  What I like most is the ability to use my smart phone to control my viewing selection.  I like the price, the ease of setup, and the network security.  This is my 2nd one!
author: Rodney L. Jones "wayne shorter fan"

review: We thought it would be a good alternative after our Roku bit the dust.  Unfortunately, it's frustrating to try to watch a movie when it crashes constantly.  We are going out to buy a new Roku and will be tossing Google Chromecast into the garbage where it belongs.
author: Stacy

review: fast shipping and exactly as advertised

review: picked this up earlier today and all it has been is a headache it won't stay connected to my phone or connect to my laptop at all. My wifi is excellent full signal on my laptop and phone but apparently chromecast cannot pick this up. I will be returning this tomorrow.
